ACCEPT_TERMS_2: Having read the information provided by Alexander ADV, you can give your specific consent to the processing of your personal data to use the services of the Site.
ACCEPT_TERMS_3: I ACCEPT the consents set out in the privacy policy. Not all consents are mandatory.
ACCEPT_TERMS_4: I declare that I have read and accepted the site's terms and conditions and the Privacy Policy and I authorize the processing of my personal data for the services offered by the site.
ACCEPT_TERMS_5: I consent to the processing of my Personal Data for the purposes of sending advertising communications and for the commercial purposes outlined in Article 2 of the Privacy Policy.
ACCEPT_TERMS_6: I consent to my Personal Data being disclosed to third parties in the categories indicated in Article 3 of the Privacy Policy, for the purposes set out in Article 2 of the Privacy Policy.
PRIVACY_POLICY_REQUIRED: You must accept the privacy policy.
INTELIGENT_MATCHING_TEXT: In just 11 seconds, you have access to complete property owner data, ready to be used for sales or acquisition transactions.
CONSTANT_UPDATES_TEXT: Our platform is designed to be easy to use, saving companies valuable time and resources.
EASY_TO_USE_TEXT: With Dbstore, you can connect directly with property owners, streamlining the negotiation process and expanding your business network.
ZERO_WASTE_TEXT: Reduce the costs associated with marketing and advertising strategies by targeting them exclusively to qualified and genuinely interested leads.
PRIVACY_PROTECTION_TEXT: Your data is safe and used only to offer you the best deals.
DEDICATED_SUPPORT_TEXT: Our team is always ready to assist you with any questions or issues.
PACKAGES_TEXT1: Don't waste time with endless searches.
PACKAGES_TEXT2: Trust DBStore and find the perfect offers for you right away!
PACKAGES_TEXT3: Why choose Dbstore for your business?
ABOUT_TEXT: Dbstore is the platform that simplifies and expedites the search for real estate contacts in the B2B market, allowing companies to connect directly with property owners quickly and efficiently. With Dbstore, the connection between supply and demand happens in just one click: the customer finds the property in seconds, and we provide direct contact information to immediately interact with the owner.
HOW_IT_WORKS_TITLE: How does Dbstore work for your business?
HOW_IT_WORKS_TEXT1: Access a constantly updated database of property owners, without the need to make cold calls or spend time manually searching. Dbstore offers you accurate, real-time information to support quick and informed decisions.
HOW_IT_WORKS_TEXT3_1: With just one click, the customer finds the property they're looking for, and Dbstore takes care of providing you with the owners' direct contact information. This allows you to start negotiations in real time, speeding up the process and improving your operational efficiency.
HOW_IT_WORKS_TEXT5_1: With Dbstore, your company will always have access to direct, qualified contacts, allowing you to close deals more quickly and efficiently. The platform allows you to automate acquisition processes, improving deal management and increasing business¬†opportunities.
NO_FAQS: No FAQs available at the moment.
FAQS_QUESTION_1: How do I purchase more credits?
FAQS_ANSWER_1: Navigate to the Buy Credits page via the sidebar and select a package to purchase.
FAQS_QUESTION_2: How can I download my search PDF?
FAQS_ANSWER_2: On the Search page, enter a valid ID and click Search to reveal the Download button.
FAQS_QUESTION_3: What happens if I search and the ID does not exist?
FAQS_ANSWER_3: You receive an notify that the ID was not found.
FAQS_QUESTION_4: Where can I see my past searches?
FAQS_ANSWER_4: Visit the History page via the sidebar for a full table of attempts.
FAQS_ANSWER_5: Yes, the data is obtained from verified sources and is regularly updated to ensure accuracy and¬†reliability.
FAQS_ANSWER_6: Absolutely! We protect your privacy and use your data only to provide you with the best service. We do not sell or share your information with unauthorized third parties.
FAQS_QUESTION_7: How long does it take to display the results?
FAQS_ANSWER_7: The search takes only a few seconds. The system is optimized for fast and accurate display¬†of¬†results.
FAQS_QUESTION_8: Do I need to create a profile?
FAQS_ANSWER_8: Yes. In order to perform searches, you need to create a profile with your company information. This allows the system to verify the validity of the user and provide access to the contact¬†database.
FAQS_QUESTION_9: Can I delete my account at any time?
FAQS_ANSWER_9: Yes, you can request deletion of your account at any time from your profile settings or by contacting our support. Once deleted, all your data will be removed in accordance with our privacy policy.
